text: cea mi hen dxk hrux wa brrda phu thi thuk ham cak kar subsib kan læw phwk khea k klab pi kratha nı sing thi phwk khea di thuk ham xea wi læa phwk khea subsib nintha kan nı kar thabap læa kar pen satru læa kar fafun than rx sul læa meux phwk khea ma ha cea phwk khea ca klaw thakthay mi hemuxnkab thi xallxhˌ thrng klaw thakthay dwy kha phud nan læa phwk khea klaw nı hmu phwk khea wa thami xallxhˌ cung mi thrng lngthosʹ rea tam thi rea di klaw thakthay (muhammad) nrk k penkar phx pheiyng kæ phwk khea læw phwk khea k ca thuk phea him nı nan man pen thang klab thi chaw ray ying
